pages.text: Nihility is the absence of magic itself, a force that seeks to negate, destroy, and erase all other forms of magic. Practitioners of Nihility can nullify spells, unravel enchantments, and create voids where no magic can exist.
It is the anti-magic, a counterforce to the power that shapes the world. Nihility is the magic of nothingness, a cold and unyielding force that seeks to strip the world of its mystical energy.
Its practitioners are often seen as wielders of destruction, seeking to undo the very essence of magic.
